meanings.definition: A weight hung from a fixed point so that it can swing freely back and forth.
meanings.sent1: The pendulums in the clock swing rhythmically.
meanings.sent2: The pendulums of the grandfather clock tick-tocked steadily.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted at the pendulums of the wall clock.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions swung like pendulums, never staying still.
meanings.sent5: The pendulums of the metronome kept the music in perfect time.
